name: No Fuss
overview: A puzzle game consisting of 60 levels in which the player must push and arrange blocks to form the shape presented on the lower side of the screen. Second Game by ANMA productions. Although commonly believed to be their first game, the ANMA duo (André Ligthart and Martijn Maatjens), revealed in an interview that Squeek was actually released before No Fuss, and that a more advanced Game Boy port was developed and completed, but never released.
